title: shan kharaharapriyA
sahitya:
shankaraharapriyA gurunAthanE ! (shiva shankara)

ninkaramE enRum abhayakaram ena tigazhndiDum shiva  

anupallavi  

pankaja padam tozhum bhaktar tam vAzhvinil

sangaTam nIngiyE mangaLam pongumE  

caraNam  

tattuva vittagarum dinam paNindiDum pAvananum nIyE!

nitya nimala nigamAgama pUraNa guNanidhiyum nIyE!

satya rUpa kAmAkshi annai amsam ena tigazhndAyE!

uttamaneRidanil ulagOr uyndiDa oppilAda tavamEndiya paranE
